role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Android Studio on nearly any OS
role_description_full_overview: This role ensures that DNS requests are encrypted if you supply it the appropriate configuration. It uses systemd on Linux. On macOS/Windows, it installs and configures [Stubby](https://github.com/getdnsapi/stubby).
